```markdown
# Government of Canada Tender Announcement: C.16 Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist (Level 3)

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-642-64086615
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: 202401930
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-24
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-12T14:00:00 (expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31

### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Canadian Firearms Program (CFP) requires a Senior C.16 Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist to further expand the Privacy Impact Assessments (PIAs) for the CFP’s Canadian Firearms Digital Services Solution (CFDSS).

### Contract Requirements

* The successful bidders will be required to:
	+ Conduct comprehensive Privacy Impact Assessments for the CFDSS
	+ Assess the privacy risks and develop mitigation strategies
	+ Provide guidance and advice on modifying CFP policy and procedures regarding privacy considerations
* The work will continue through the remainder of the project

### Security Requirements

* The contract will require a Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Enhanced Reliability level of security

### Relevant Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement
* Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three times per year

### Contact

* **Name**: Hannah State
* **Email**: Hannah.State@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (506) 238-0450
```
